alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ORLEANS, SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearlington, or 9 miles southeast of Slidell, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearlington. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 270 and 272. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
